ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.tooltip: All Channels: show all available channels. My Projects: only channels from projects I own. Guest Projects: only channels from projects I'm invited to.

problems.title: Problems
problems.tooltip:
Channel status filter:

• **Problematic** — show only channels requiring attention. Includes:
  - Channels without configured credentials
  - Channels with post publication errors
  - Stale channels (no new posts for more than 3 days)
  - Deactivated channels

• **All** — show full list of channels, including healthy ones.

validation.checkFormErrors: Please check the form for errors
validation.failedStatusExplanation: Posts with FAILED status are excluded from the scheduler and will not be published automatically. Fix the content and change the status to resume publishing.

validation.invalidYaml: Must be a valid YAML object (key-value pairs), not a list or value

validation.publicationValidationWarning: The publication content exceeds the allowed limits for some social networks. If you save it anyway, affected posts will be marked as FAILED and excluded from the scheduler until you fix the content.

support.title: Browser Support
support.full: Your browser fully supports all required technologies for video editing and export (H.264, AAC/Opus).
support.partial: Your browser has limited support. Export in some formats may be unavailable (e.g., AAC or H.264 might be missing).
